definition: intended for the left hand, a turn toward the side of the body that is on the north when the person is facing east, toward or on the left
details:
adjective
- intended for the left hand
= synonyms: left-hand
- being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north
= example: being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north
- of or belonging to the political or intellectual left
- not used up
= synonyms: odd
noun
- a turn toward the side of the body that is on the north when the person is facing east
= example: a turn toward the side of the body that is on the north when the person is facing east
- the piece of ground in the outfield on the catcher's left
= example: the piece of ground in the outfield on the catcher's left
= synonyms: left field
- the hand that is on the left side of the body
= example: the hand that is on the left side of the body
= synonyms: left hand
- those who support varying degrees of social or political or economic change designed to promote the public welfare
= synonyms: left wing
- location near or direction toward the left side
adverb
- toward or on the left
